claim: Recombinant technology leads to a broader immune response that may provide cross-protection, even in a mismatch season.
explanation: Page 2 of a CDC MMWR document showing the table of contents, CDC adoption of ACIP recommendations text, and publication/editorial information does not support the claim since the page contains only document structure, publication credits, and policy context without any data or discussion of recombinant vaccine immune responses or cross-protection Note: Content is clear and complete for page 2; no relevant data are present
